casebody.data:
Regina Radford Doss and Amy Radford Barrett, as the Co-administrators of the Estate of Tony Marie Pridgen Radford, Plaintiffs
v.
Brenton D. Adams, Brent Adams Law Offices, PC, d/b/a "Brent Adams & Associates," Defendants No. COA16-446 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: December 6, 2016

AFFIRMED.
